The Torva platebody is part of the Torva armour set, requiring 80 Defence to wear. The platebody boasts the highest strength bonus of any body slot equipment, being 2 higher than the Bandos chestplate, Inquisitor's hauberk, and fighter torso. As a Zarosian-aligned item, Torva armour will give Zarosian protection within the God Wars Dungeon.

The platebody is created by combining a damaged Torva platebody, obtained as a drop from Nex, with two Bandosian components. This process requires level 90 Smithing, and is not reversible.

Nex 11/258

Historical[edit | edit source]

Torva armour was one of the original rewards from Nex upon her release in RuneScape. Compared to Old School RuneScape's version of the Torva platebody, the original had several differences:

  • Having the armour equipped made all factions in the God Wars Dungeon unaggressive, rather than just Zarosian NPCs.
  • The armour required level 80 Hitpoints in addition to Defence.
  • The platebody boosted Hitpoints by a 200 life points, equal to 20 Hitpoints.
  • The armour degraded, lasting for 15 hours of combat. When fully degraded, the base repair costs for the platebody was 2,000,000 coins.
  • The platebody had the following bonuses:
Item Attack Bonuses Defence Bonuses Other
Torva platebody 0 0 0 -31 -11 +156 +140 +120 -10 +160 +4 0 0% +1

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
5 January 2022
(update | poll)

The item is now obtainable.

16 December 2021
(update)

The item was added to the game, but was unobtainable.

The '''Torva platebody ''' is part of the [[Torva armour]] set, requiring 80 [[Defence]] to wear. The platebody boasts the highest [[strength bonus]] of any body slot equipment, being 2 higher than the [[Bandos chestplate]], [[Inquisitor's hauberk]], and [[fighter torso]]. As a [[Zaros]]ian-aligned item, Torva armour will give [[God Wars Dungeon#God equipment|Zarosian protection]] within the [[God Wars Dungeon]].

The platebody is created by combining a damaged Torva platebody, obtained as a drop from [[Nex]], with two [[Bandosian components]]. This process requires level 90 [[Smithing]], and is not reversible.

==Historical==
Torva armour was one of the original rewards from Nex upon her release in ''RuneScape''. Compared to Old School RuneScape's version of the Torva platebody, the original had several differences:
* Having the armour equipped made all factions in the [[God Wars Dungeon]] unaggressive, rather than just Zarosian NPCs.
* The armour required level 80 Hitpoints in addition to Defence.
* The platebody boosted Hitpoints by a 200 life points, equal to 20 Hitpoints.
* The armour degraded, lasting for 15 hours of combat. When fully degraded, the base repair costs for the platebody was 2,000,000 coins.
* The platebody had the following bonuses:
